Dataset Name: New York City subway stations information
Description: The data provided by MTA shows the location of each station. Based on the data, we can match each station in a borough.
The data provided by MTA shows the entry/exit register values for each turnstile at the control area in each station. Based on the data, we can find the number of people at each station.

Dataset Name: COVID-19 Positive Cases for each County
Description: The data provided by The New York Times reports the cumulative counts of coronavirus cases in the United States, at the state and county level.
